data.subject: IS
data.title: Introduction to Research Methods
data.description: Students meet individually with the instructor once a week to discuss their particular research projects and to develop research and writing skills. Students do short assignments on topics of their choice using a variety of resources.

data.subject: IS
data.title: Introductory Independent Research
data.description: This introductory independent research course involves regular meetings with a designated faculty member and at least seven hours a week of independent work on a topic of particular interest to the student and approved by a faculty member.

data.subject: IS
data.title: Interdisciplinary Research Design for Independent Studies
data.description: An overview of the process to find focus, identify sources, select methods and procedures for analysis, and structure arguments to achieve interdisciplinary research projects. Particular emphasis is placed on self-directed approaches to rigorous questioning and analysis.

data.subject: IS
data.title: Thesis Proposal Development
data.description: This course provides Three-Year General Independent Studies students the opportunity to prepare and plan for their application to the Thesis Project Phase of the Three-Year General academic plan.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 2B Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Thesis Phase I
data.description: Advanced work for an Independent Studies student to develop a thesis which is a scholarly documentation of research accomplished in the final year of undergraduate studies in the Three-Year General academic plan.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3A Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Thesis Phase Stage I - Part 1
data.description: Advanced work for an Independent Studies student to develop scholarly documentation of research accomplished in the final year of undergraduate studies in the Three-Year General academic plan.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3A Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Thesis Phase Stage I - Part 2
data.description: A continuation of IS 311 to complete the Three-Year General Independent Studies Thesis Phase Stage I.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3A Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Thesis Phase II
data.description: A continuation of IS 310 to complete the Three-Year General Independent Studies thesis.

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Thesis Phase Stage II - Part 1
data.description: A continuation of IS 312 to begin the Three-Year General Independent Studies Thesis Phase Stage II.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3B Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Thesis Phase Stage II - Part 2
data.description: A continuation of IS 321 to complete the Three-Year General Independent Studies Thesis Phase Stage II.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3B Three-Year-General Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Honours Thesis Proposal Development
data.description: This course provides Honours students with the opportunity to identify a focus, accomplish background research, and to develop a research topic in preparation for the Honour Thesis Project Phase.
data.prerequisites: Level at least 3B Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Honours Independent Research
data.description: This Honours independent research course involves regular meetings with a designated instructor and at least seven hours a week of independent work on a topic of particular interest to the Honours student and approved by an instructor.

data.subject: IS
data.title: Honours Thesis Phase I
data.description: Advanced work for an Honours Independent Studies student to develop the thesis project as a scholarly documentation of Honours level research accomplished in the fourth year of undergraduate studies.
data.prerequisites: IS 100, 200, 330; Level at least 4A Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Honours Thesis Phase Stage I - Part 1
data.description: Advanced work for an Honours Independent Studies student to develop the thesis project as a scholarly documentation of Honours level research accomplished in the fourth year of undergraduate studies.
data.prerequisites: IS 100, 200, 330; Level at least 4A Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Honours Thesis Phase Stage I - Part 2
data.description: A continuation of IS 411 to complete the Honours Independent Studies Thesis Phase Stage I.
data.prerequisites: IS 411; Level at least 4A Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Honours Thesis Phase II
data.description: A continuation of IS 410 to complete the Honours Independent Studies thesis.
data.prerequisites: IS 410; Level at least 4B Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Honours Thesis Phase Stage II - Part 1
data.description: A continuation of IS 412 to begin the Honours Independent Studies Thesis Phase Stage II.
data.prerequisites: IS 412; Level at least 4B Honours Independent Studies students

data.subject: IS
data.title: Part-time Honours Thesis Phase Stage II - Part 2
data.description: A continuation of IS 421 to complete the Honours Independent degree Thesis Phase Stage II.
data.prerequisites: IS 421; Level at least 4B Honours Independent Studies students
